email_content:
Hi MedTech Innovations team,

I’ve been using the new patient management system in our clinic and wanted to share some feedback.

What’s working well
• The interface is intuitive and easy to navigate, which helps our staff onboard quickly.

Opportunities for improvement
• Medication and therapy scheduling would benefit from more customizable repeat options to accommodate complex care plans.
• Adding optional analytics dashboards that highlight patient progress over time would provide valuable insights for clinicians and administrators.

Overall, we’ve already begun to see meaningful improvements in patient outcomes since adopting the platform, and I’m excited to see how the product continues to evolve.

Thank you for your work, and please let me know if any clarifications would be helpful.

Best regards,
sensitive_items: They have a combination of Applied Behavior Analysis (ABA), Speech Therapy, and Occupational Therapy sessions.
